source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    ID,
    Name,
    NodeTag,
    Description,
    CreatedDate,
    CASE 
        WHEN UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_1'
        WHEN LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_2'
        WHEN UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_5'
        WHEN LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_7'
        WHEN LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_4'
        ELSE NodeTag + '_Unknown'
    END AS ConvertedNodeTag
FROM 
    SampleData;

SELECT 
    ID,
    Name,
    NodeTag,
    Description,
    CreatedDate,
    CASE 
        WHEN UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_1'
        WHEN LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_2'
        WHEN UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_5'
        WHEN LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_7'
        WHEN LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 1, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             LOWER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 2, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS AND
             UPPER(SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1)) = SUBSTRING(NodeTag, 3, 1) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS
        THEN NodeTag + '_4'
        ELSE NodeTag + '_Unknown'
    END AS ConvertedNodeTag,
    Convert(varchar(5), ASCII(Substring(NodeTag, 1, 1))) AS AsciiValueOfFirstChar
FROM 
    SampleData;
